text: Murray Ernest Chapple was born 25 July, 1930 in Christchurch and died 31 July, 1985 in Hamilton. He was a New Zealand cricketer who played 14 tests for New Zealand spread over 13 years. He also played for Canterbury and Central Districts in the Plunket Shield. ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:1985 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Christchurch
title: Murray Chapple
